title: Create Job with Completion Count
description: Create a Job named ||batch-job|| in Namespace ||default|| using image ||busybox:1.35|| that runs command ||echo 'Processing batch'|| and completes ||3|| times.

steps: kubectl create job batch-job --image=busybox:1.35 --dry-run=client -o yaml > batch-job.yaml
2. Edit YAML to set completions: 3 and command

validations.description: Job should be configured to complete 3 times
